The University of Wisconsin-Whitewater continues to see steady enrollment growth across both of its campuses as they welcome their largest freshman class in a decade.

UW-Whitewater at Rock County launches online program to graduate more licensed teachers in Wisconsin.
Hired Before Graduation “Where Are They Now?”: Miguel Aranda
August 20, 2025
Miguel Aranda truly embodies what it means to be a Warhawk for life. He earned both his bachelor’s and master's degrees from the University of Wisconsin-Whitewater.
Hired Before Graduation “Where Are They Now?”: Robyn McGinnis
July 25, 2025
McGinnis, who grew up in nearby Elkhorn, cherished the relationships she made at the university leading up to her graduation in 2015 with a B.S. in liberal studies.
Math alum Chris Bitz finds his fit in actuarial science
July 14, 2025
Chris Bitz, who earned a B.S. in mathematics in 2023, was a four-year member of the Warhawk men’s track and field team. Now he is thriving as an actuarial analyst for Nationwide in downtown Milwaukee.

For the ninth consecutive year, the University of Wisconsin-Whitewater has been named among the Colleges of Distinction.
UW-Whitewater physical education alums named National Teachers of the Year
June 18, 2025
Of the five National Teachers of the Year announced this spring by SHAPE America — the professional development and advocacy organization for physical education, health education, and adapted PE — two of them called UW-Whitewater home as undergraduate students.

The University of Wisconsin-Whitewater Foundation has formally announced the university’s “Our Stories. Our Future.” fundraising campaign.

Warhawk Jake Lesh, who was Hired Before Graduation in 2013 graduate, shares the story of where he is now.
UW-Whitewater Enactus earns national championship
May 30, 2025
The University of Wisconsin-Whitewater’s Enactus team, an organization that uses business as a force of good to improve people’s lives and their communities, was named the 2025 Enactus USA champion last week at the Enactus United States Expo in Kansas City, Missouri.

May 29, 2025
Beto Patino Luna, a student at the University of Wisconsin-Whitewater, was recently announced as one of 441 recipients nationwide of the Barry M. Goldwater Scholarship.
URock announces scholarship opportunity for fall 2025 students
May 28, 2025
UW-Whitewater at Rock County is offering 10 scholarships worth $1,000 each to students to enroll full-time or part-time (at least 6 credits) for fall 2025 classes.
